sub_topic: Identification of functional groups in a compound using infrared spectroscopy
message_1: What functional groups are present in Compound X based on the IR spectrum provided? Be sure to identify specific peaks and explain their corresponding functional groups.
message_2: Unfortunately, I cannot view the IR spectrum as I am an AI language model and cannot process images or files. However, I can help you interpret an IR spectrum if you provide me with the specific peak values and their positions.
